# Class IntentUtils

Utility class for intent operations. Provides helper methods for creating intent compilers and matchers with default configurations.

##### Index

### Methods

compileIntents createIntentMatcherPipeline createIntentMatcherWithEmbedder createIntentMatcherWithEmbedderAndLLM createIntentMatcherWithLLM

## Methods

### `Static`compileIntents

  * compileIntents(  
intents: [IntentInterface](/interfaces/primitives_intent_intent.IntentInterface)[],  
embedder?: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder),  
): Promise<[CompiledIntent](./primitives_intent_compiled_intent.CompiledIntent)[]>

Creates an intent compiler and compiles the provided intents.

#### Parameters

    * intents: [IntentInterface](/interfaces/primitives_intent_intent.IntentInterface)[]

Array of intents to compile

    * `Optional`embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Optional text embedder for generating embeddings

#### Returns Promise<[CompiledIntent](./primitives_intent_compiled_intent.CompiledIntent)[]>

Promise resolving to compiled intents

#### Throws

InworldError if compilation fails




### `Static`createIntentMatcherPipeline

  * createIntentMatcherPipeline(  
intents: [IntentInterface](/interfaces/primitives_intent_intent.IntentInterface)[],  
embedder?: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder),  
llm?: [LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM),  
config?: any,  
): Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Creates a complete intent matching pipeline. Compiles intents and creates a matcher in one operation.

#### Parameters

    * intents: [IntentInterface](/interfaces/primitives_intent_intent.IntentInterface)[]

Intents to compile and match against

    * `Optional`embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Optional text embedder

    * `Optional`llm: [LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM)

Optional LLM

    * `Optional`config: any

Optional custom configuration

#### Returns Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Promise resolving to an intent matcher

#### Throws

InworldError if creation fails




### `Static`createIntentMatcherWithEmbedder

  * createIntentMatcherWithEmbedder(  
embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder),  
compiledIntents: [CompiledIntent](./primitives_intent_compiled_intent.CompiledIntent)[],  
config?: any,  
): Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Creates an intent matcher with the specified embedder and compiled intents. Uses default embedding configuration.

#### Parameters

    * embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Text embedder for embedding-based matching

    * compiledIntents: [CompiledIntent](./primitives_intent_compiled_intent.CompiledIntent)[]

Compiled intents to match against

    * `Optional`config: any

Optional custom configuration (uses default if not provided)

#### Returns Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Promise resolving to an intent matcher

#### Throws

InworldError if creation fails




### `Static`createIntentMatcherWithEmbedderAndLLM

  * createIntentMatcherWithEmbedderAndLLM(  
embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder),  
llm: [LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM),  
compiledIntents: [CompiledIntent](./primitives_intent_compiled_intent.CompiledIntent)[],  
config?: any,  
): Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Creates an intent matcher with both embedder and LLM for compound matching. Uses default compound configuration.

#### Parameters

    * embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Text embedder for embedding-based matching

    * llm: [LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM)

LLM for LLM-based matching

    * compiledIntents: [CompiledIntent](./primitives_intent_compiled_intent.CompiledIntent)[]

Compiled intents to match against

    * `Optional`config: any

Optional custom configuration (uses default if not provided)

#### Returns Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Promise resolving to an intent matcher

#### Throws

InworldError if creation fails




### `Static`createIntentMatcherWithLLM

  * createIntentMatcherWithLLM(  
llm: [LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM),  
compiledIntents: [CompiledIntent](./primitives_intent_compiled_intent.CompiledIntent)[],  
config?: any,  
): Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Creates an intent matcher with the specified LLM and compiled intents. Uses default LLM configuration.

#### Parameters

    * llm: [LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM)

LLM for LLM-based matching

    * compiledIntents: [CompiledIntent](./primitives_intent_compiled_intent.CompiledIntent)[]

Compiled intents to match against

    * `Optional`config: any

Optional custom configuration (uses default if not provided)

#### Returns Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Promise resolving to an intent matcher

#### Throws

InworldError if creation fails
